backingCard.cardText: Play: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.
Elusive.You may use Mack the Knife as if it belonged to the active house.Action: Deal 1<D> to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, gain 1<A>.
Play: Deal 2<D> to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, steal 1<A>.
Elusive. Skirmish.Each time you play an artifact, steal 1<A>.
backingCard.flavorText: “Give me half a chance an’ I’ll steal the whole of it.”

backingCard.cardText: Play: Choose a house on your opponent’s identity card. Your opponent must choose that house as their active house on their next turn.
Action: Ready and fight with a friendly creature.
backingCard.flavorText: “I said ‘take me to your leader’ and got a fist to the face.”  –Captain Val Jericho

backingCard.cardText: Play: Return 2 enemy creatures to their owner’s hand.
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Reap: Use an opponent’s artifact as if it were yours.
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)Action: Steal 1<A>.
Omni: Sacrifice Mighty Javelin. Deal 4<D> to a creature.
Play: Destroy the 3 most powerful creatures.
backingCard.flavorText: “Destitution. Dereliction. Defenestration.”

backingCard.cardText: Each friendly creature gets +1 power.
Play: If you have not played any other cards this turn, gain 3<A>. For the remainder of the turn, you cannot play cards.
Play: Capture 3<A>.
backingCard.flavorText: It doesn’t like to share.

backingCard.cardText: Play: Each undamaged creature captures 1<A> from its opponent.
Omni: Sacrifice Screechbomb. Your opponent loses 2<A>.
backingCard.flavorText: “I think that thing made me deaf!”“What? I can’t hear you! I think that thing made me deaf!”

backingCard.cardText: During their “draw cards” step, your opponent refills their hand to 1 less card.
Silvertooth enters play ready.
backingCard.flavorText: If you see teeth gleaming in the dark, it’s already too late.

backingCard.cardText: Fight: Steal 1<A>.
backingCard.flavorText: “What did you do, Tiny?” –Valdr

backingCard.cardText: Action: Use a friendly creature.
backingCard.flavorText: “I know I shouldn’t’a nicked it, but ‘twere so…shiny. –Noddy the Thief

backingCard.cardText: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Overlord Greking, put that creature into play under your control.
Fight: Gain 1<A>.
backingCard.flavorText: “I mean, I think it’s a head...”

backingCard.cardText: This creature gets +2 power and gains hazardous 2. (Before this creature is attacked, deal 2<D> to the attacking enemy.)
Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)Fight: Steal 1<A>.
backingCard.flavorText: “When the fightin’s done, the real work begins.”

backingCard.cardText: Before Fight: Deal 1<D> to each enemy creature.
backingCard.flavorText: Guess how he got that name.

backingCard.cardText: Play: Your opponent loses 1<A>.
backingCard.flavorText: Whatever he doesn’t like, he breaks. He doesn’t like anything.

backingCard.cardText: Play: Destroy each creature with power 3 or lower.
backingCard.flavorText: “Did you feel that?”

backingCard.cardText: Play: Destroy a creature that is not on a flank.
backingCard.flavorText: “Let me give you a hand...”

backingCard.cardText: Shadow Self deals no damage when fighting.  Damage dealt to non-Specter neighbors is dealt to Shadow Self instead.
Play: If your opponent has 7<A> or more, they lose 4<A>.
backingCard.flavorText: “If you can’t protect it, you don’t deserve it.” –Bilgum Avalanche

backingCard.cardText: Play: Return an enemy creature to its owner’s hand.
